Example Spring Project

  1. Download the example Spring Framework project or browse the source here
  2. Run FitNesse as a wiki server using:
    mvn clean verify -P wiki
  3. Visit http://localhost:9123/SpringExample and explore!
  1. Run FitNesse as automated integration tests using:
    mvn clean verify -P auto
  2. The JUnit XML results can be found at target/fitnesse/results
  3. The FitNesse HTML reports can be found at target/fitnesse/reports
  • A custom Fit Fixture (SpringColumnFixture) had to be written for the Fit tests, and a custom Slim Runner (SpringSlimRunner) for the Slim tests. (More on the difference between the Fit and Slim engines of FitNesse can be found in Gojko Adzic's presentation.)
